body:
Comment 3: 
In related news: the current doc recommends configuring with --with-ld=/opt/gold/bin/ld.
The Fedora package for gcc, gcc-go, etc. just use /usr/bin/ld and it's up to the user to
configure the system to use the gold linker (installed at /usr/bin/ld.gold by the
binutils package) using the alternatives mechanism.
